Containers.Name: RCON
Containers.Description:
This plugin adds RCON to your unRAID server and enables your to connecto to various servers who are following the RCON protocol standard. Simply issue 'rcon -h' from an unRAID Terminal and you get an overview on how to connect. A basic connection command will look like this: 'rcon -H RCONIP -p PORT -P PASSWORD' to end the connection press CTRL + C.
ATTENTION: The RCON protocol transmits everything un-encrypted (including your password!). Therefore it is strongly recommended to not connect to RCON over the internet rather it is recommended to use a VPN or SSH if you want to connect to a foreign server over the internet.
Source: https://github.com/n0la/rcon
